REST API main¶

REST API repository Contacts¶

async src.repository.contacts.create_contact(body: ContactSchema, db: AsyncSession, user: User)¶

Creates a new contact for a specific user.

Parameters:

  • data – dict: The data for creating the new contact (e.g., name, email, phone, etc.).

  • db – AsyncSession: The database session.

  • user – User: The user for whom the contact is being created.

Returns:

Contact: The created contact object.

async src.repository.contacts.delete_contact(contact_id: int, db: AsyncSession, user: User)¶

Deletes a specific contact for a specific user.

Parameters:

  • contact_id – int: The unique identifier of the contact to delete.

  • db – AsyncSession: The database session.

  • user – User: The user associated with the contact.

Returns:

bool: True if the contact was successfully deleted, otherwise False.

async src.repository.contacts.get_contact(contact_id: int, db: AsyncSession, user: User)¶

Retrieves a specific contact by its ID for a specific user.

Parameters:

  • contact_id – int: The unique identifier of the contact.

  • db – AsyncSession: The database session.

  • user – User: The user associated with the contact.

Returns:

Contact | None: The contact object if found, otherwise None.

async src.repository.contacts.get_contacts(limit: int, offset: int, db: AsyncSession, user: User)¶

Retrieves a list of contacts for a specific user with specified pagination parameters.

Parameters:

  • offset – int: The number of notes to skip.

  • limit – int: The maximum number of notes to return.

  • user – User: The user to retrieve notes for.

  • db – db: The database session.

Returns:

List[Note]: A list of notes.

async src.repository.contacts.search_contact(query: str, db: AsyncSession, user: User)¶

Searches for contacts that match a specific query for a specific user.

Parameters:

  • query – str: The search query to match against contact names, emails, or other fields.

  • db – AsyncSession: The database session.

  • user – User: The user associated with the contacts.

Returns:

List[Contact]: A list of contacts that match the search query.

async src.repository.contacts.upcoming_birthdays(db: AsyncSession, user: User)¶
async src.repository.contacts.update_contact(contact_id: int, body: ContactUpdateSchema, db: AsyncSession, user: User)¶

Updates an existing contact for a specific user.

Parameters:

  • contact_id – int: The unique identifier of the contact to update.

  • data – dict: The updated data for the contact (e.g., name, email, phone, etc.).

  • db – AsyncSession: The database session.

  • user – User: The user associated with the contact.

Returns:

Contact | None: The updated contact object if found, otherwise None.

REST API repository Users¶

async src.repository.users.confirmed_email(email: str, db: AsyncSession) → None¶

Confirms the email address for a specific user.

Parameters:

  • email – str: The email address of the user to confirm.

  • db – AsyncSession: The database session.

Returns:

None

async src.repository.users.create_user(body: UserSchema, db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db))¶

Creates a new user in the database.

Parameters:

  • body – UserSchema: The user data to create the new user (e.g., email, password, etc.).

  • db – AsyncSession: The database session (provided by dependency injection).

Returns:

User: The created user object.

async src.repository.users.get_user_by_email(email: str, db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db))¶

Retrieves a user by their email address.

Parameters:

  • email – str: The email address of the user to retrieve.

  • db – AsyncSession: The database session (provided by dependency injection).

Returns:

User | None: The user object if found, otherwise None.

async src.repository.users.update_token(user: User, token: str | None, db: AsyncSession)¶

Updates the refresh token for a specific user.

Parameters:

  • user – User: The user object whose token needs to be updated.

  • token – str | None: The new refresh token to associate with the user (or None to clear it).

  • db – AsyncSession: The database session.

Returns:

None

REST API routes Contact¶

async src.routes.contacts.create_contact(body: ContactSchema, db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user))¶

Creates a new contact for the current user.

Parameters:

  • body – ContactSchema: The data for the new contact (e.g., name, email, phone, etc.).

  • db – AsyncSession: The database session (provided by dependency injection).

  • current_user – User: The authenticated user making the request.

Returns:

ContactResponse: The created contact’s details.

async src.routes.contacts.delete_contact(contact_id: int = Path(PydanticUndefined), db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user))¶

Deletes a specific contact for the current user.

Parameters:

  • contact_id – int: The unique identifier of the contact to delete.

  • db – AsyncSession: The database session (provided by dependency injection).

  • current_user – User: The authenticated user making the request.

Returns:

None

async src.routes.contacts.get_contact(contact_id: int, db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user))¶

Retrieves a specific contact by its ID for the current user.

Parameters:

  • contact_id – int: The unique identifier of the contact to retrieve.

  • db – AsyncSession: The database session (provided by dependency injection).

  • current_user – User: The authenticated user making the request.

Returns:

ContactResponse: The requested contact’s details.

Raises:

HTTPException – 404 if the contact is not found.

async src.routes.contacts.get_contacts(limit: int = Query(10), offset: int = Query(0), db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user))¶

Retrieves a paginated list of contacts for the current user.

Parameters:

  • limit – int: The maximum number of contacts to return (10-500).

  • offset – int: The number of contacts to skip (used for pagination).

  • db – AsyncSession: The database session (provided by dependency injection).

  • current_user – User: The authenticated user making the request.

Returns:

list[ContactResponse]: A list of contacts for the user.

async src.routes.contacts.get_upcoming_birthdays(db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user))¶

Retrieves a list of contacts with birthdays in the next 7 days for the current user.

Parameters:

  • db – AsyncSession: The database session (provided by dependency injection).

  • current_user – User: The authenticated user making the request.

Returns:

list[ContactResponse]: A list of contacts with upcoming birthdays.

Raises:

HTTPException – 404 if no contacts are found.

async src.routes.contacts.search_contacts(query: str = Query(PydanticUndefined), db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user))¶

Searches for contacts that match a specific query for the current user.

Parameters:

  • query – str: The search query to match against contact names or emails.

  • db – AsyncSession: The database session (provided by dependency injection).

  • current_user – User: The authenticated user making the request.

Returns:

list[ContactResponse]: A list of matching contacts.

Raises:

HTTPException – 404 if no contacts are found.

async src.routes.contacts.update_contact(body: ContactUpdateSchema, contact_id: int = Path(PydanticUndefined), db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user))¶

Updates an existing contact for the current user.

Parameters:

  • body – ContactUpdateSchema: The updated data for the contact.

  • contact_id – int: The unique identifier of the contact to update.

  • db – AsyncSession: The database session (provided by dependency injection).

  • current_user – User: The authenticated user making the request.

Returns:

ContactResponse: The updated contact’s details.

Raises:

HTTPException – 404 if the contact is not found.

REST API routes Users¶

async src.routes.users.get_current_user(user: User = Depends(get_current_user))¶

Retrieves the details of the currently authenticated user.

Parameters:

user – User: The authenticated user object (provided by the auth_service.get_current_user dependency).

Returns:

UserResponse: The details of the currently authenticated user.

REST API routes Auth¶

async src.routes.auth.confirmed_email(token: str, db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db))¶

Confirms a user’s email address using a verification token.

Parameters:

  • token – str: The email verification token.

  • db – AsyncSession: The database session (provided by dependency injection).

Returns:

dict: A message indicating the email confirmation status.

Raises:

HTTPException – 400 if the token is invalid or the user does not exist.

async src.routes.auth.login(body: OAuth2PasswordRequestForm = Depends(NoneType), db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db))¶

Authenticates a user and generates JWT access and refresh tokens.

Parameters:

  • body – OAuth2PasswordRequestForm: The user’s login credentials (email and password).

  • db – AsyncSession: The database session (provided by dependency injection).

Returns:

TokenSchema: The access and refresh tokens.

Raises:

HTTPException – 401 if the email is invalid, email is unconfirmed, or the password is incorrect.

async src.routes.auth.refresh_token(credentials: HTTPAuthorizationCredentials = Depends(HTTPBearer), db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db))¶

Refreshes the user’s access and refresh tokens.

Parameters:

  • credentials – HTTPAuthorizationCredentials: The refresh token from the Authorization header.

  • db – AsyncSession: The database session (provided by dependency injection).

Returns:

TokenSchema: The new access and refresh tokens.

Raises:

HTTPException – 401 if the refresh token is invalid or does not match the user’s stored token.

async src.routes.auth.request_email(body: RequestEmail, background_tasks: BackgroundTasks, request: Request, db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db))¶

Sends an email verification request to a user.

Parameters:

  • body – RequestEmail: The user’s email address for verification.

  • background_tasks – BackgroundTasks: The background task manager for sending the email.

  • request – Request: The HTTP request object to generate the confirmation email link.

  • db – AsyncSession: The database session (provided by dependency injection).

Returns:

dict: A message confirming that the email has been sent.

async src.routes.auth.signup(body: UserSchema, bt: BackgroundTasks, request: Request, db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db))¶

Registers a new user account.

Parameters:

  • body – UserSchema: The registration details (email, password, etc.).

  • bt – BackgroundTasks: The background task manager for sending confirmation emails.

  • request – Request: The HTTP request object to generate the confirmation email link.

  • db – AsyncSession: The database session (provided by dependency injection).

Returns:

UserResponse: The created user’s data.

Raises:

HTTPException – 409 if the user already exists.
